rows.label: qev051401_MSG0001
rows.name: You are the BLADE, then?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051401_MSG0002
rows.name:
My name is Zo Zinath, and I hope you might accept a
request.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051401_MSG0003
rows.name:
As you well know, the recent history of my people is
marked by a shameful period of subjugation by the
Ganglion.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051401_MSG0004
rows.name: We have since found our way to autonomy, true...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051401_MSG0005
rows.name:
But the taint of that experience yet weighs heavy on my
heart.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051401_MSG0006
rows.name:
Ever since claiming independence, I have sought the
chance to vent my anger and avenge the honor of my
people.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051401_MSG0007
rows.name: I believe that time is now.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051401_MSG0008
rows.name:
I have come into possession of a piece of information
capable of dealing a crippling blow to the Ganglion.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051401_JNK0010
rows.name: Query

rows.label: qev051401_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask to hear this information.

rows.label: qev051401_JNK0020
rows.name: Counsel

rows.label: qev051401_SEL0021
rows.name: Advise Zo Zinath not to act out of spite.

rows.label: qev051401_MSG0009
rows.name:
May I take your interest as agreement to assist me
in this matter?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051401_MSG0010
rows.name:
...Excellent. This is further proof that humans are a
noble race, and that a strong sense of pride and honor
connects our people.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051401_MSG0011
rows.name: It is not spite that spurs me on.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051401_MSG0012
rows.name:
It is simply a Wrothian's commitment to honorâ€”
defended by blood when necessary.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051401_MSG0013
rows.name:
Perhaps my reasoning is difficult for other races to
understand.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051401_MSG0014
rows.name: But I had thought a human surely would.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051401_MSG0015
rows.name: So please help me in this endeavor.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051401_MSG0016
rows.name:
A Ganglion stronghold they call Badr Stronghold stands
in the northwest of Sylvalum.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051401_MSG0017
rows.name:
I have learned that they are currently working to
develop a new weapon there.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051401_MSG0018
rows.name:
If we can steal the plans for that weapon,
it would deal a significant blow to their war effort.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051401_MSG0019
rows.name: I would entrust that mission to you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051401_MSG0020
qev051401_MSG0021
rows.name: My proposal will benefit both of our peoples.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051401_MSG0022
rows.name:
I hope that this joint effort against our common foe will
serve to further strengthen the bond our peoples share.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051401_MSG0023
rows.name:
The Ganglion have spread their influence across much
of Sylvalum.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051401_MSG0024
rows.name:
This Badr Stronghold where they are conducting
weapons research stands in the northwest portion
of the continent.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051401_MSG0025
rows.name:
Their new weapon is already under development,
but if we can steal the plans, it should allow us to
craft countermeasures.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051401_MSG0026
rows.name:
The sooner you can procure the plans, the better.
Please make haste.[ST:wait ]
